We've taken our popular Thai Silk panels and added a ruched header valance creating the most luxurious, over the top style in window treatments out there. This style was designed and meant to be stationary and used as decorative panels to frame out your window. Choose from a pre-designed collection or Create Your Own.

Please note that thai silk is lightly textured with varying slubs. These are not considered a flaw or defect & will vary from panel to panel.

As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.

Built-in are two header designs within a single panel. The attached back tabs for a formal pleated look and a traditional pole pocket.

As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.

Our Ruched Header Drapes represent extravagant luxury adding a new dimension in window decor. These are tailored from the finest shimmering faux silk Taffeta in gorgeous tones, adding a ballroom elegance to any room. These panels work best as a decorative enhancement.

As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.

product.name: Winter Ivory Yarn Dyed Faux Dupioni Silk Swatch
Chartreuse Yarn Dyed Faux Dupioni Silk Curtain
product.description:
Our Yarn Dyed Faux Dupioni Silk Curtains & Drapes bring the look of luxury without the cost or high-maintenance care. With our EXCLUSIVE 3" Pole Pocket with Back Tab (Hidden Tab) & Hook Belt Header you can hang this panel various ways. Use the hook belt to hang from rings, the attached back tabs for a formal pleated look or use the traditional pole pocket for a sheered, gathered look.



As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.

These drapes & curtains are tailored from the finest 100% Cotton. Great attention is given to each step of the production process. They are finished with a weighted hem and shade-enhancing lining.

As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.

HPD has redefined the construction of sheer curtains and panels. Our sheers are classic and unmatched in their quality and craftsmanship. These sheers will filter the light and add a soft shimmer to any room.

As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.

product.name: Pair (2 Panels) White Solid Faux Organza Sheer Curtain

These beautiful and classic solid organza sheer curtain panels come two in the set for extra value. These sheer panels are unmatched in quality and design. They create a warm atmosphere with beautiful light diffusion.

As a general rule, for proper fullness panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window/opening.
